text: Oleg Shapovalov (; 16 February 1963 â€“ 6 August 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Party of Regions. He was President of the Kharkiv Oblast Council from 2005 to 2006. Shapovalov was born in Izium, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Shapovalov died on 6 August 2021 at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian politicians
title: Oleg Shapovalov
